lines.text: What are the grounds for divorce in this state?
Marriage.

[picks up phone]
Hello?
Oh, hello, Jeffrey. Yes, are you there?
Of course I'm here.
Now don't shout at me - I'm in jail.
Well, that's all right; we don't need you.

I'm in jail for battery, and I want you to get me out. I'm at the Susquehannah Street Jail . . . Susquehannah! Susquehannah - S-U-S-Q-U-Q! Q! You know, the thing you play billiards with . . . Billiards! B-I-L-L-
What is this, a spelling bee?

Ahem. No, "L" for larynx. L-A-R-Y . . . N-No, not "M", N! . . . "N" as in neighbor! Neighbor, N-E-I-G-H-B--B! B! Bzzz. Bzzz. You know, the stinging insect! Insect! I-N-S-S! S, for symbol. S-Y . . . Y! Y!
Well, why? Don't ask me "why."
Look, Jeffrey. I'm in jail. W-wait a minute. What jail did you say this was?
Susquehannah Street Jail.

Thank you, indeed. Thank you very much. I'm in the Substi--The Subset-Jeffrey, listen closely . . . Do you know where the Oak Street Jail is? You do? Fine. I'll have them transfer me there in the morning!
I told you, I haven't even met her. But I'd kinda like to marry her... I think I will.
secret marriage!
We're the only two people in New York who don't think we're married.
Think? I know we're not.
I'm beginning to have my doubts.
What does your watch say?
It says, "Tick tick tick tick tick tick tick tick."

[to Jeff]
Well, to tell the truth, I don't know you well enough to tell you the truth.

[after finding Peter tap-dancing]
What were you doing?
Oh, just having fun.
The great Petrov doesn't dance for fun!
Maybe not, but I do. Pete Peters, remember me?
Oh, that awful name of yours!
I dunno, I kinda like it! Peter P. Peters, Philadelphia, PA.
[Does short dance step]
How do you make that exasperating noise? What have you got on those shoes?
Taps.
Taps! On your ballet shoes!
Aw, but Jeff, I haven't neglected anything! Observe! The Entrechat Trois!
[Does ballet step]
Lovely! Beautiful!
But how much more effective it is this way!
[Does tap variation on ballet step]
I'm just a bowl in a gold of fish!
You mean a fish in a bowl of gold.
That's what I said, a bowl in a goldfish!
